DaD.formulas

Class HeroFormulas

  • java.lang.Object
    • DaD.formulas.HeroFormulas

  • public class HeroFormulas
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Clovis on 07/02/2017. Class containing base stats for hero. Used to calculate stats and rewards depending on class, race, gender modifiers.
    See Also:
    Env, HeroRace, HeroFormulas, HeroGender

      • calcBaseMaxExperience

        public static Env calcBaseMaxExperience(HeroRace race,
                                        HeroGender gender)

        Parameters:
        race - Race of hero
        gender - Gender of hero
        Returns:
        Env

      • calcLevelUpMaxExperience

        public static double calcLevelUpMaxExperience(Hero hero)

        Parameters:
        hero - Hero you want to calculate extra exp required
        Returns:
        double

      • calcExperienceGained

        public static double calcExperienceGained(Hero hero,
                                          MonsterInstance monsterInstance)
        From given monsterInstance calculate experience earned by the hero.

        Calculation take in count level difference, race and gender.

        Parameters:
        hero - Hero to calculate experience earned
        monsterInstance - MonsterInstance killed by hero
        Returns:
        double
